meanings.definition: The quality or state of being illegible.
meanings.sent1: The illegibilities of the handwriting made it impossible to decipher.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's messy handwriting resulted in illegibilities on the prescription.
meanings.sent3: Trying to read the illegibilities on the menu felt like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The illegibilities on the map led us in circles, unable to find our way.
meanings.sent5: The illegibilities on the document were like a secret code waiting to be cracked.

meanings.definition: The condition of being difficult or impossible to read.
meanings.sent1: The illegibilities of the ancient text puzzled historians.
meanings.sent2: The faded ink caused illegibilities in the old letter.
meanings.sent3: The illegibilities on the sign caused confusion for the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The illegibilities in the contract made it hard to understand the terms.
meanings.sent5: The illegibilities in the message left us guessing at its meaning.
